title: If little girl who hasn't reached puberty passes in front of me Is my prayer invalid Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh so chef there's a hadith which says that um if a woman a donkey or a dog passes in front of a person who's praying his prayer is in palate does this also apply uh for uh little girls like if a little girl of age of four or five passes in front of me while i'm praying no no this does not apply for little girls it applies only for adult women girls that have reached the age of puberty so little girls do not impact your prayer hassan
